-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/ciProduct 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/ciProduct

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-ciProduct#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/ciProduct
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-ciProduct#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)
